title: Cincinnati

source.publication: Picturesque America or The land we live in

viewpoint.description: View of Cincinnati from elevated perspective

description: Antique wood-engraved print from William Cullen Bryant's classic 1872 work 'Picturesque America.' Engraved by W. Wellstood and drawn by A.C. Warren, this 1873 illustration captures Cincinnati's urban landscape during the post-Civil War period of American expansion and development.
